sub_title: Journalism and Social Communication Graduate with Master in Applied Marketing
summary: Communications professional with expertise in internal and external communication. I am skilled at developing and implementing effective communication strategies that engage and motivate employees and stakeholders. I have a strong track record of success working for international companies and multicultural teams.
